channel.title: Important: Leave
channel.description:
Hello everyone, i know i am going to be flamed for posting useless crap like this but, i have been with moparscape since before 'testscape' came out. its astonishing how little private servers are evolving, but i have seen some pretty smart people as i come and go. yes im not one of the "1 lyk3 t0 p0st!!11" kinda guys, but i have had my fair share in a few projects:
9 Servers 5 Major C++ projects Website building (current site http://www.randomstoof.com ) 2 Major GUI projects
and so on, the main point of this post is to clear up some things. Learn to spell, read, type, infact ill make a list
Learn to:
Spell! (Not Leet) Read "1 d0nt get 1t! plzz mail m3 da finish3d project plz" And most of all, Learn java before you read the tutorials. Type, Typing is very important in java coding. MAIN THING! Respect!
hopefully if you do Learn to do those things you can talk with some respect to each other, Example of disrespect;
Advertisement section - Removed! Reason: No respect for the rules.
Most good coders leaving moparscape and quiting private servers! Reason: No respect, flooding there email box with useless crap.
thats just 2, i can stay here for a long time but i have to go now. Please dont post back with useless stuff like "L2READ RULES" because this is me saying Good Bye. (I will not see posts or be able to reply to them)
